title: r/Entitledparents WHY WON'T YOU PAY FOR MY VACATION?!
description: r/Entitledparents In today's episode, OP wins a free vacation as part of a raffle. She knows that if she invites her spoiled sister, her sister will treat it as if it's HER vacation and ruin OP's trip. So, she decides to invite her friend instead. When her sister finds out about the vacation, she completely flips out at OP and basically proves that OP was right to never invite her. If you like this episode, follow me for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
